string.text: ANOMALOUS ACTIVITY
Install the five scanners in the marked areas
Before getting on with transmuting, I should find the most potent anomalous zone possible. For that, I should install the scanners in the marked spots.
TRANSMUTATION
Commence the transmutation
I have everything necessary for transmuting the artifact. Let's get cooking!
Wait for the process to finish
It seems the transmutation has begun. I should wait a bit.
Grab the artifact
Something appeared during the process. It seems the transmutation is a success.
Take the transmuted artifact to Dubinin
The processor appears to be a success. Time to return to Agroprom and receive a reward.
TRANSMUTATION
Find the Altered Insulator in the military base
To successfully carry out the transmutation, I'll have to find a unique artifact dubbed the �Concrete Chip�. It should be located somewhere within the abandoned military base.
GENERATORS
Find a way to deactivate the electricity

The generators turned out to be operational, and their power source isn't quite clear. I should find a way to get inside the control room, where the artifact should be located. But how do I turn off the electricity? I should examine everything carefully. Going in head-on is not an option.
MYSTERIOUS DEATH
Examine the stalker corpse
Some stalker fell down right in front of me with no life signs. I'll check his body � might contain something useful.
Ask the locals about the dead stalker
The stalker, named Kite, left a note before death mentioning some type of manhunt. I should ask the local stalkers dwelling in the village about this poor guy. I'll visit their leader.
Examine the scene of Ferret's suicide

Eustace told me that Kite wasn't the only one who did away with himself. Some stalker named Ferret shot himself in one of the houses six months ago. I should examine his place of death, see if I can dig something up.
Show the note to Eustace
I was able to find Ferret's note in the house he shot himself in. This is worth showing to Eustace.
Ask the local stalkers

I found a note on the scene of Ferret's suicide, but this only brings more questions. Who is hunting down stalkers before their death? I'll try questioning the locals � perhaps they know something. In the meantime, Eustace set off to the craftsmen Kite was working for. They might have some information.
Find Zarmut and talk about Ferret
A young stalker named Zarmut might know more about Ferret's death. I should track him down near a camp by some abandoned cabin.
Return to Eustace
Seems like a dead end. I have no new information. I should have a discussion with Eustace � he's likely to have learned something from the craftsmen and returned by now.
Read Eustace's suicide note
Eustace is dead. Next to his body is a note.
Discuss recent events
Son of a gun! How is this even happening? I need to discuss what to do next with the stalkers.
Ask the stalker masters about Eustace
One of the last people to see the now-dead stalkers while they were alive were the seasoned stalkers at the bridge. I need to scout around this evening and figure out what to do next.
Run
Jump from the bridge
I no longer see any other option. Those black shadows are inside me. If I don't kill myself, I will not kill them.
Find the stalker assassin
The stalker killer who brought the curse upon the whole village reeked of motor oil. What could that be? I'll go to the village and find out.
Take Pancras to the shore
Pancras took my bait. Now I only have to take him to the bridge, where I hope everything will end.
Bury the five stalkers

Five stalkers died because of someone's quest for profit. Among them was Nazgul, who somehow managed to help me crack this case. May they now have eternal rest as the stalker camp no longer suffers from the curse.
EASY PICKINGS
Get rid of the sleeping stalkers
Just in case, I need to get rid of those stalkers.
Get the loot
Here's the backpack with the supplies...
Talk to the decoy
Time to discuss things with the decoy.
VILLAGE SCANNER
Gain the stalkers' trust
The local stalkers wouldn't be happy by unknown equipment being placed in their camp. First I need to gain their trust. After solving their problems, perhaps things will change.
Install the scanner
It seems the stalkers are starting to treat me as one of their own. I hope now I can install the scanner in the village.
KITE'S LOOT
Examine the area
I found out where Kite kept his loot. Perhaps I'll find something useful there.
POLTERGEIST
Find out what keeps the mutant at the station

An unusual poltergeist is hovering at the station and doesn't want to leave. Perhaps that is its lair? If so, why isn't it attacking me? Strange... I should examine the area, as installing the scanner in its lair wouldn't be a good idea. I need to get rid of the mutant somehow.
Find the soldier's possessions

By the look of it, the hovering creature at the station was once a soldier from the nearby military base, now turned into a poltergeist. His notes indicate a place where he kept his belongings. I'd better go there and try to find out something.
Follow the creature
The strange poltergeist decided to traverse over here. I don't think him has any hostile intentions, and is trying to tell me something. Perhaps I should follow him?
Take the reward
Is this supposed to be a reward for the soldier's belongings? I'm confused.
HUNT
Talk to Zakhar
The leader of the local hunters took my scanner for inspection. While waiting, I agreed to go on a hunt. Jug told me that it's a good source of money. Why not try?
Wait for daylight
Zakhar tells me the forest is dangerous at night. I should wait and go hunting during daylight.
Acquire a shotgun
Zakhar demands I get a shotgun. He says the military base might have some firearms. I should take a look there and try to find something.
Go on a hunt with Zakhar
I'm setting off with Zakhar on a hunt. Should be easy: shoot and provide cover if anything happens.
Eliminate the mutants
I should help Zakhar shoot down the mutants.
Help Zakhar
Grab the scanner
INCIDENT
Hide from the attackers
I was ambushed where I was supposed to meet with the scientists. What's the meaning of this?
Take cover in the village

Trusting the ambushers is a no-go, having opened fire on me a few minutes ago. The only safe spot in the area is the stalker camp in the abandoned village. No matter how tough those guys are, they won't poke their nose there.
Bury the transmuted artifact
Something strange is happening. I should get rid of the artifact. Burying it in the tunnel ruins would be a good idea � plenty of room to hide it there, and from there I'll go to the Cordon.
Leave Novoshepelychi
It's time to get out of here. I also need to get in contact with Yurok. I need to leave the Zone.
Talk to Yurok
I'm leaving the Zone. One last thing: I'll see Yurok and tell him about everything.
GENERAL SHTOK
Return to the clearing
I should return to the clearing, where we last met the general. Zakhar and I did some decent damage on him. Perhaps we'll find some traces.
Follow the blood trail
Zakhar wounded a boar. I should try following the blood trail that will lead me to its lair.
Examine the hole
It seems this is general Shtok's place of residence. I should examine the lair and settle things with the mutant while it's wounded.
Kill the mutant
I found the colossal boar. Now I just have to dispose of it.
Search the hunter's body
I found the body of the missing hunters in the cave. I should examine it.
Inform Jug about recent events
I managed to kill general Shtok. I'll tell Jug about everything.
MUSICIAN FROM NOVOSHEPELYCHI
Find out why the stalker is having trouble playing
I came across a small stalker encampment. One of them is having a hard time playing the guitar. Great opportunity for a joke!
Find a guitar for Yurets
I promised the stalker to look for a new guitar. There should be something suitable in the village of Novoshepelychi. I should ask the village residents.
Give the guitar to Yurets
I at least managed to get my hands on an intact instrument. I hope this is what the stalker's looking for.
Take the guitar to Yurets
Not long ago, I met some poor musician with a broken guitar. I think he'll be glad to see what I've found. Why let it go to waste?
FREEDOM SQUAD
Talk to the leader
A certain Crab from Freedom asked me for help with something. Why not see what he wants?
OIL DEPOT
Help Crab deal with the bandits
Crab and his men are some of the remnants of Freedom in the Zone. They've asked me to clear out the bandits from the oil depot so that they can settle there for a while.
Talk to Crab
Bandits eliminated. I'll talk to the Freedom squad leader about a reward.
BIG PROBLEM
Talk to Crab
The Freedom fighters need help with something again. This might be interesting. If I find myself in those parts, I could check it out.
Prepare to hunt the chimera
The Freedom squad needs help. Crab asked me to participate in a hunt on a chimera that's hanging around near their camp. I've never met one of those before, so I need to prepare.
Follow Crab
We're almost there. Now I should carefully approach the chimera and unleash the firestorm.
Kill the chimera
Hardest part has come: deal with the chimera. Hope we come out alive.
Talk to Crab
The chimera's dead and the area is safer. Time to talk to the Freedom squad leader about my reward.
